name: Chocolate Snickerdoodles
author: rhancox
summary: This chocolate snickerdoodle recipe is similar to a basic snickerdoodle recipe but some of the flour is replaced with cocoa powder.
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Mix together 1 1/2 cups white sugar, shortening, and eggs with an electric mixer in a bowl until creamy
Sift together all-purpose flour, cocoa power, cream of tartar, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl
Fold this mixture into the egg mixture until well blended
Mix together 1/4 cup white sugar and cinnamon in a shallow bowl or on a plate
Roll cookie dough into 1-inch balls; cover each in sugar and cinnamon mixture
Place on an ungreased baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until soft and golden on top, 6 to 8 minutes, making sure they do not burn
Let cool before transferring to a wire rack
The tops will crack as they cool
